p:
We performed a genome‐wide search of all 31,471,836 SNPs in dbSNP151 (as available in GTEx version 7
40 ) for an association with GBA transcription (Supplementary Fig. 1). All SNPs suggestive of genome‐wide significance ( P < 1 × 10 − 6) were also tested with the CoDeS3D
30 algorithm to discover which other genes might be coregulated by the same SNPs.
